(ROOT
  (SBAR (RB Ever) (IN since)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBD started)
        (S
          (VP (VBG getting)
            (ADJP (JJ serious))
            (PP (IN about)
              (NP (NN food)))
            (, ,)))))))


advmod(started-4, Ever-1)
mark(started-4, since-2)
nsubj(started-4, I-3)
root(ROOT-0, started-4)
dep(serious-6, getting-5)
xcomp(started-4, serious-6)
prep(serious-6, about-7)
pobj(about-7, food-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN learned)
        (S
          (NP (DT that))
          (NP (PRP it))
          (SBAR (IN If)
            (S
              (NP (EX there))
              (VP (VBP are)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNS people))
                  (VP (VBG eating)
                    (NP (PRP it))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(learned-3, I-1)
aux(learned-3, have-2)
root(ROOT-0, learned-3)
nsubj(are-8, that-4)
dep(are-8, it-5)
mark(are-8, If-6)
expl(are-8, there-7)
xcomp(learned-3, are-8)
nsubj(are-8, people-9)
partmod(people-9, eating-10)
dobj(eating-10, it-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB then))
    (NP (EX there))
    (VP (MD must)
      (VP (VB be)
        (ADJP
          (NP (NN something))
          (JJ good)
          (PP (IN about)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP it))
              (CC and)
              (NP (PRP$ its)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN matter))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (NN learning))))))))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB appreciate)
              (NP (PRP it)))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(good-6, then-1)
expl(good-6, there-2)
aux(good-6, must-3)
cop(good-6, be-4)

root(ROOT-0, good-6)
prep(good-6, about-7)
pobj(about-7, it-8)
cc(it-8, and-9)
poss(matter-12, its-10)
det(matter-12, a-11)
conj(it-8, matter-12)
prep(matter-12, of-13)
pobj(of-13, learning-14)

xcomp(good-6, appreciate-16)
dobj(appreciate-16, it-17)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD ca) (RB n't)
      (VP (VB understand)
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB why))
          (S
            (NP (NNS people))
            (VP (MD would)
              (VP (VB make)
                (NP (PDT such) (DT a) (JJ big) (NNS fuss))
                (PP (IN about)
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG eating)
                      (NP
                        (NP (NN something))
                        (ADJP (RB as) (JJ simple)))
                      (PP (IN as)
                        (NP
                          (NP (NNP Bean) (NNP Curd))
                          (PP (IN with)
                            (NP (NNP Fish) (NNP Paste))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

  (S (CC And)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD learned)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NN way)

              (VP (TO to)
                (VP
                  (ADVP (RB really))
                  (VB appreciate)

              (VP (TO to)

                            (VP (VBG blanching)

                                (NP

    (. .)))

    (NP
      (NP (NNP Fresh) (NNP Ikan) (NNP Parang))

        (-RRB- -RRB-)))

      (VP
        (VP (VBN filletted)
          (CC and)
          (VBN beaten)
          (PP (TO to)
            (NP (DT a) (NN paste)))
          (NP
            (NP (DT every) (NN day))
            (PP (IN by)
              (NP (NN hand)))))

        (VP (VBN used)

              (NP (DT a) (NN filling))

    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN case))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNP Mua) (NNP Chee)))))
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (VBN sweetened) (NN ground) (NNS peanuts)))
    (. .)))

root(ROOT-0, is-5)
mark(used-11, that-6)
mark(used-11, because-7)
amod(oil-9, less-8)
nsubjpass(used-11, oil-9)
auxpass(used-11, is-10)
advcl(is-5, used-11)


(ROOT
  (PP (IN after)
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN meal))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD will)
            (VP (VB feel)
              (ADJP (RB comfortably) (JJ full))))
          (, ,))))))


root(ROOT-0, after-1)
det(meal-3, the-2)
pobj(after-1, meal-3)
nsubj(feel-6, you-4)
aux(feel-6, will-5)
rcmod(meal-3, feel-6)
advmod(full-8, comfortably-7)
acomp(feel-6, full-8)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC but)
    (RB not)
    (ADVP (RB uncomfortably))
    (PP (IN bloated))
    (. !)))


cc(not-2, but-1)
root(ROOT-0, not-2)
dep(not-2, uncomfortably-3)
prep(not-2, bloated-4)


(ROOT
  (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
    (S
      (NP (NNP T3) (NNP +) (NNP V2) (NNP .5) (NNP +) (NNP S2))
      (VP (VBD +)
        (NP
          (QP (CD E0) (CD .75)))))
    (-RRB- -RRB-)))


nn(S2-7, T3-2)
nn(S2-7, +-3)
nn(S2-7, V2-4)
nn(S2-7, .5-5)
nn(S2-7, +-6)
nsubj(+-8, S2-7)
root(ROOT-0, +-8)
number(.75-10, E0-9)
dobj(+-8, .75-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (PRP himself))
      (ADJP (JJ !!)))))


nsubj(!!-4, This-1)
cop(!!-4, is-2)
attr(!!-4, himself-3)
root(ROOT-0, !!-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP 'm)
      (ADJP (JJ serious)))
    (. .)))


nsubj(serious-3, I-1)
cop(serious-3, 'm-2)
root(ROOT-0, serious-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Goldhill))
      (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
        (NP (NNP Jin) (NNP Shan))
        (-RRB- -RRB-)))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (PRP$ his) (JJ Chinese) (NN name)))
    (. .)))


nsubj(name-9, Goldhill-1)
nn(Shan-4, Jin-3)
appos(Goldhill-1, Shan-4)
cop(name-9, is-6)
poss(name-9, his-7)
amod(name-9, Chinese-8)
root(ROOT-0, name-9)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (PRP$ His) (NN father))
    (SBAR
      (WHNP (WP who))
      (S
        (VP (VBD started)
          (S
            (VP (VBG selling)
              (NP (NNP Hakka) (NN food))
              (PP (IN from)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN pushcart))
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (DT the) (NNP 1940) (POS 's))))))))
        (, ,)))))


poss(father-2, His-1)
root(ROOT-0, father-2)
nsubj(started-4, who-3)
dep(father-2, started-4)
xcomp(started-4, selling-5)
nn(food-7, Hakka-6)
dobj(selling-5, food-7)
prep(selling-5, from-8)
det(pushcart-10, a-9)
pobj(from-8, pushcart-10)
prep(pushcart-10, in-11)
det(1940-13, the-12)
pobj(in-11, 1940-13)
possessive(1940-13, 's-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB eventually))
        (VBN opened)
        (NP (DT a) (NN restaurant)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBN named)
        (NP (PRP it))
        (PP (IN after)
          (NP (PRP him)))))
    (. !)))


advmod(opened-2, eventually-1)
root(ROOT-0, opened-2)
det(restaurant-4, a-3)
dobj(opened-2, restaurant-4)
cc(opened-2, and-5)
conj(opened-2, named-6)
dobj(named-6, it-7)
prep(named-6, after-8)
pobj(after-8, him-9)
